review: This is an awesome box that Amazon got right the first time.  I have tried all of the rest but this is the best overall.  They all have their pros and cons, if you are a Prime member this is a no brainer.  Between this box and my Apple TV I'm pretty much covered for content and features. First of all this is very easy to setup even if you are not a techie.  Their is quite a bit of content that you can get off of Prime Instant Video.  Also you can now listen to Amazon prime music as well.  Which are both free if you are a prime member.  The third party content providers keep growing too.  Everything you need to get started is included except the HDMI cable.  My daughter, Wife and I play games with each other pretty fun family activity.  You can pickup a bunch of games for free or a couple of bucks at most. I bought the optional gaming controller at the time of purchase.  So, I haven't tried the remote that came with the box on games.
